rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with wheelchair accessible design including ramps and handrails.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern living area with natural light from West-facing windows, ensuring energy efficiency and Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, optimized for dining gatherings with wheelchair accessible pathways.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design with open layout and easy accessibility, incorporating energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Guest room designed for privacy with accessible features.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; includes space for wheelchair maneuverability and Vastu-compliant positioning.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom with safety features.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library area integrated into the living space for quiet study and relaxation.

openings.description: Accessible entrance with ramp and automatic door.
Large windows to maximize natural light and enhance the view of the garden.
Sliding door connecting living area to the large garden and outdoor space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with Vastu orientation and accessible design.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Room for additional family member or guest; wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Dedicated study room for work and relaxation, with ample natural light.

openings.description: Balcony providing access to garden and fresh air.
Additional windows ensuring proper ventilation and natural light in accordance with Vastu.
